clone.title: Clone Distribution
clone.subtitle: Create a copy of
clone.progress: Cloning distribution... This may take a while for large distros.
clone.errorSameAsSource: Clone name must be different from the source

import.title: Import Distribution
import.locationHelper: WSL will store the distribution's virtual disk here
import.errorNoName: Please enter a name for the distribution

rename.title: Rename Distribution
rename.subtitle: Rename
rename.updateTerminalDesc: Updates the display name in Terminal's dropdown menu
rename.renameShortcutDesc: Renames the shortcut file in the Start Menu
rename.errorEmpty: Please enter a name for the distribution
rename.errorSameAsCurrent: New name must be different from the current name

password.title: Sudo Password Required
password.descriptionSuffix: requires elevated privileges to run on
password.instruction: Enter your Linux user password for sudo access:
password.securityNote: Your password is used only for this action and is not stored.

telemetry.title: Help Improve WSL UI
telemetry.subtitle: Would you like to share anonymous usage data?
telemetry.privacyNote: No personal data, distro names, file paths, or identifying information is ever collected. Data is processed by
telemetry.changeAnytime: You can change this anytime in Settings → Privacy

noRdp.title: No Desktop Environment Detected
noRdp.description: We couldn't detect xrdp running in this distro.
noRdp.instructions: To use Remote Desktop, you'll need to set up a desktop environment and xrdp server.
noRdp.learnMore: Learn how to set up a Linux desktop

review.title: Finding WSL UI useful?
review.description: A quick review helps others discover this tool and keeps the project going. It only takes 30 seconds.

move.title: Move "{{name}}"
move.subtitle: Move distribution to a new location
move.locationHelper: The distribution's virtual disk will be moved to this folder.
move.progress: Moving distribution... This may take a while for large distros.

compact.title: Compact "{{name}}" Disk
compact.subtitle: Reclaim unused disk space from the virtual disk
compact.warningUac: This operation requires administrator privileges (UAC prompt)
compact.warningShutdown: WSL will be shut down during this operation
compact.warningDoNotClose: Do not close the app or shut down your computer
compact.progressSteps: Running fstrim, shutting down WSL, then compacting VHDX.
compact.progressWait: Please wait. This operation cannot be cancelled.

resize.title: Resize "{{name}}" Disk
resize.subtitle: Adjust the maximum size of the virtual disk
resize.noteDescription: You can only increase the virtual disk size. The new size must be larger than the current virtual size. The file size on disk (sparse) will remain small until you use the space.
resize.errorMinSize: Size must be at least 1 GB
resize.errorTooSmall: New size must be larger than current virtual size ({{size}})

setUser.title: Set Default User
setUser.subtitle: For "{{name}}"
setUser.usernameHint: Lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens only.
setUser.infoNote: This user will be logged in automatically when you start this distribution. The user must already exist in the distribution.
setUser.errorStartLowercase: Username must start with a lowercase letter
setUser.errorInvalidChars: Username can only contain lowercase letters, digits, underscores, and hyphens
setUser.errorTooLong: Username must be 32 characters or less

setVersion.title: Set WSL Version
setVersion.subtitle: For "{{name}}"
setVersion.warningTime: This operation may take several minutes.
setVersion.convertToWsl2: Converting to WSL 2 will create a virtual disk (VHDX) from the filesystem.
setVersion.convertToWsl1: Converting to WSL 1 will extract the filesystem from the virtual disk.
setVersion.progress: Converting to WSL {{version}}... This may take a few minutes.

stopAction.shutdownReason: to be shut down to release the virtual disk.

closeAction.title: Close Application?
closeAction.description: Would you like to minimize to the system tray or quit completely?
closeAction.changeInSettings: You can change this later in Settings

diskMount.title: Mount Disk to WSL
diskMount.adminWarning: Mounting physical disks may require administrator privileges

mountedDisks.title: WSL Disk Mounts
mountedDisks.noDisksHint: Use "Mount Disk" to attach VHD or physical disks
